doctor.name: Dr. Sahed Uddin Ahmed
doctor.info: Dr. Sahed Uddin Ahmed is an experienced medicine, rheumatology, and diabetes specialist in Chattogram, holding MBBS (DMC), BCS (Health), FCPS (Medicine), and MD (Internal Medicine) qualifications. He serves as an Assistant Professor in the Department of Medicine at Chittagong Medical College Hospital. Dr. Sahed treats a range of conditions including arthritis, joint pain, rheumatoid diseases, diabetes, hypertension, fever, peptic ulcer, asthma, chest pain, and other general medicine and rheumatic disorders. He sees patients at Asperia Health Care Ltd, located at Al-Noor Badrun Centre, 1486/1672, OR Nizam Road, Probartak Circle, Chattogram. His visiting hours are from 5.30pm to 7pm, except on Fridays.
